column1: #text=I was bored one weekend and decided I would like to read a new book .
#text=I checked in my wallet to make sure I had my library card .
#text=Seeing that I did in fact have the card , I got in my car and drove to the nearest branch of the public library , about four miles from my home .
#text=When I went in , I first checked out the new arrivals , both fiction and non-fiction .
#text=Then I looked at biographies , then at the books on the stacks for favorite authors .
#text=I finally decided on a few selections , two from the new fiction section and one from the new non-fiction section , as well as a book on poetry .
#text=I went to the check-out desk and presented the books along with my card to the librarian .
#text=She checked the books out to me along with a receipt which told me when the books were due back .
